title: Will biometric identification be integrated into our ID and driver’s licenses? - Quora
tags: Uber Drivers and Driving for Uber

response.answer_text: Biometrics are integrated into some IDs. Federal Common Access Cards (CACs) or Personal Identification Verification (PIV) cards include corneal and thumbprints. It’s really not that big of a deal. If you want to get into a secure location, you need to prove who you are.
